content.question: Which of the following best represents the most distinctive characteristic of an oligopoly?

choices.label: A market with a single firm that faces no competition
A market where a few firms have significant market share
A market with low barriers to entry
A market with many firms selling differentiated products
A market with many firms earning zero economic profits in the long run

content.answer: A market where a few firms have significant market share

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
